tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE remote_work_training_sessions_attendance (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE,
    participant_id INT,
    participant_name TEXT,
    attended BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE training_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE,
    session_duration TIME,
    attendee_count INT,
    trainer_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE attendee_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(50),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    date_submitted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingSessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL,
    topic TEXT NOT NULL,
    presenter TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE training_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE,
    session_time TIME,
    trainer_id INT,
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    attendees TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    company VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    attendee_id INT,
    rating INT,
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trainers (
    trainer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trainer_name VARCHAR(255),
    expertise VARCHAR(255),
    experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE RemoteWorkTrainingSession ( 
 session_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 session_date DATE, 
 session_duration INT, 
 attendee_name VARCHAR(50), 
 attendee_email VARCHAR(50) 
)

CREATE TABLE TrainingSessionAttendance ( 
 attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 session_id INT, 
 attendee_id INT, 
 attending_status BOOLEAN 
)

CREATE TABLE TrainingSessionFeedback ( 
 feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 session_id INT, 
 attendee_id INT, 
 feedback_text TEXT, 
 feedback_rating INT 
)

CREATE TABLE AttendeeSkills ( 
 attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 skill_1 VARCHAR(50), 
 skill_2 VARCHAR(50), 
 skill_3 VARCHAR(50) 
)

CREATE TABLE SkillDevelopmentEvaluation ( 
 evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 attendee_id INT, 
 session_id INT, 
 evaluation_date DATE, 
 evaluation_result TEXT 
)
